title: Heirloom Polki Diamond & Pearl Pendant - A Timeless Elegance
materials: Emerald Beads. Features a traditional Hyderabadi polish for an antique golden luster.
features: This exquisite pendant showcases the timeless beauty of Polki diamonds in a Chandbali-inspired design. The uncut diamonds are meticulously set in a closed setting (kundan setting), maximizing their natural brilliance. Dangling pearl drops are adorned with green emerald beads, adding a touch of regal charm. The locket features intricate filigree work on the reverse.
occasions: and festive celebrations. Can also be styled for contemporary ethnic wear to add a touch of heritage.
description: A true heirloom piece, this pendant embodies the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry. The use of uncut Polki diamonds gives it a unique, raw beauty, while the addition of pearls and emeralds adds a touch of sophistication. This is a statement piece that will be treasured for generations to come.
